General.Name: Tomypak Holdings Bhd
General.Description: Tomypak Holdings Berhad, an investment holding company, engages in the manufacturing and marketing of flexible packaging materials for food and beverage companies primarily in Malaysia. It offers packaging materials for powdered beverages; high barrier metalized packaging materials for seasonings and powdered beverages; hot fill packaging materials for mayonnaise and sauces; general packaging materials for confectionery, instant noodles, and snacks; and specialty packaging materials for pet food products and detergents. The company also manufactures and sells polyethylene, and polypropylene films and sheets, as well as wholesales plastic materials in primary forms. In addition, it exports its products to Singapore, Thailand, Indonesia, the Philippines, Myanmar, Papua New Guinea, Sri Lanka, Russia, Ukraine, Australia, New Zealand, Brazil, Nigeria, Peru, and South Africa. The company was incorporated in 1979 and is headquartered in Johor Bahru, Malaysia.
